title: Stand [for Bottles], ca. 1810
provenance: W. G. T. Burne, London; 1983 WPW
description: Flat base with reeded molding around edge; thick reeded guard rings for 7 bottles supported by vertical brackets with feathered motifs; tall central loop handle with two applied floral mounts at base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stand [for Bottles], ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. copper, silver. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-19.
